Package org.ruleant.ariadne

Class Summary
AboutActivity This activity displays information about the App : version, build date, author and license info.
AriadneLocation Custom Ariadne Location object, it inherits from Location class, but overrides the getString() method.
DebugLevel Class checking debug level This class will get the current Debug level from SharedPreferences.
FormatUtils Methods to convert values to formatted string.
LocationService Location Service provides the current location.
LocationStore Location Store saves a location, it will store a location for future use, and will the save the location when the application is stopped.
MainActivity Main Activity class.
SettingsActivity A PreferenceActivity that presents a set of application settings.
SettingsActivity.DebugPreferenceFragment This fragment shows general preferences only.
SettingsActivity.GeneralPreferenceFragment This fragment shows general preferences only.
